item.title: About
item.description: Sarah Schulte is a software engineer with 5 years industry experience and an indie game developer. She particularly enjoys playing tennis, pondering game design, and playing rhythm games (currently, mostly addicted to Beat Saber).

item.title: Contact
item.description: you found me! send a message to: easteregg [at] sarah [dot] engineer to win absolutely nothing at all
